name: random-nfts-ipfs
description: This API is a web server built with Express in Node.js that provides endpoints for handling image uploads, generating images by combining layers, and uploading metadata to IPFS via Pinata. Additionally, it integrates authentication functionality using JWT tokens and enables CORS to allow requests from any origin. In summary, this API facilitates operations related to image processing and metadata management in a web application or service.
author: Alberto Lasa
